trans-unit.source: WorkflowInstance is a lightweight, per-instance runtime for executing a workflow program.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowInstance er en lett, per forekomst-kjøretid for kjøring av en arbeidsflyt-programmet.

trans-unit.source: It can be constructed to create a new workflow instance or from existing instance state.
trans-unit.target: Det kan genereres for å opprette en ny arbeidsflytforekomst eller fra en eksisterende forekomsttilstand.

trans-unit.source: The APIs that <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> exposes are the minimal set of runtime controls from which higher level operations can be implemented.
trans-unit.target: APIene som <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl>viser er minimalt med kjøretiden Kontroller høyere nivå operasjoner kan implementeres som.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl>

trans-unit.source: This API set represents the entire breadth of functionality of the runtime.
trans-unit.target: Denne API-Sett representerer hele bredden på funksjonalitet av kjøretiden.

trans-unit.source: WorkflowInstance is an abstract class and relies on a host’s implementation of its abstract methods in order to provide host functionality such as synchronization, persistence, tracking, and extensions.
trans-unit.target: Avhengig av en vert implementering av de abstrakte metodene for å kunne tilby vert funksjonaliteten som synkronisering, utholdenhet, sporing og -utvidelser WorkflowInstance er en abstrakt klasse.

trans-unit.source: WorkflowInstance is single threaded and assumes that the host synchronizes all access to it.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowInstance er én fritrådet og forutsetter verten synkroniserer alle tilgang til den.

trans-unit.source: An attempt to call multiple APIs simultaneously will result in an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> being thrown.
trans-unit.target: Et forsøk på å kalle flere APIer samtidig fører til en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>som oppstod.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: Internally, a WorkflowInstance has two states: Running and Paused.
trans-unit.target: Internt en WorkflowInstance har to: kjører, og midlertidig stanset.

trans-unit.source: The only way to cause the runtime to transition from paused to running is to call <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Run%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Den eneste måten å føre til at kjøretiden overgangen fra midlertidig å kjøre er å kalle <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Run%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Run%2A>

trans-unit.source: All actions (except Pause) can only be taken while the runtime is Paused.
trans-unit.target: Alle handlinger (bortsett fra Pause) kan bare utføres mens kjøretiden er midlertidig stanset.

trans-unit.source: The runtime will become spontaneously Paused in the following situations: - An error fatal to the runtime has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Kjøretiden plutselig blir stoppet i følgende situasjoner:-kritisk til kjøretiden er feil.

trans-unit.source: The host will be signaled through <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnRequestAbort%2A> (which does not signal a transition to Paused) and then notified through <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyPaused%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Verten vil signaliseres via <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnRequestAbort%2A>(som ikke signalisere en overgang til Paused) og varslet via <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyPaused%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyPaused%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnRequestAbort%2A>

trans-unit.source: - An exception in the workflow was uncaught and escaped the root.
trans-unit.target: -Et unntak i en arbeidsflyt var uoppfanget og escape-tegn roten.

trans-unit.source: The host will be notified through the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyUnhandledException%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Verten vil bli varslet via den <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyUnhandledException%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyUnhandledException%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The scheduler has run out of work items and is now <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceState>.
trans-unit.target: -Scheduler har gått tom for arbeidselementer, og er nå <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceState>.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceState>

trans-unit.source: The host will be notified through the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyPaused%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Verten vil bli varslet via den <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyPaused%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyPaused%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the scheduler could have run out of work items because the instance is idle or because the instance is complete.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at scheduler kan være tom for arbeidselementer fordi forekomsten er inaktiv eller fordi forekomsten er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.State%2A> value of the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A> property can be used to differentiate between the two.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.State%2A>verdien for den <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A>kan brukes til å skille mellom to.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The host can request a change from Running to Paused by calling the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.RequestPause%2A> or <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.PauseWhenPersistable%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> instance returned by the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Verten kan be om en endring i å kjøre til Paused ved å ringe det <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.RequestPause%2A>eller <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.PauseWhenPersistable%2A>metoder for den <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl>forekomsten ble returnert av den <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.PauseWhenPersistable%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.RequestPause%2A>

trans-unit.source: This request should not be considered to have a specific response meaning that the host should not attempt to correlate an OnNotify* or <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnRequestAbort%2A> with a specific call to pause. In response to a pause request, the runtime may transition to Paused and call <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyPaused%2A> while the scheduler still has pending work items. The <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.State%2A> value of the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A> property can be used to determine whether the scheduler has no more work or was interrupted by a request to pause. The <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.RequestPause%2A> method of the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> instance returned by the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A> property is the only method which can be called while the WorkflowInstance is in the Running state. All other methods will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> if called.Given the rules for how WorkflowInstance transitions from one state to another, the public notion of Running and Paused can be defined as follows: - Running – The state between a call to <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Run%2A> and the next WorkflowInstance.OnNotify*.
trans-unit.target: Denne forespørselen bør ikke anses å ha svar betyr at verten ikke bør prøve å koordinere en OnNotify* eller <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnRequestAbort%2A>med et bestemt kall til pause.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnRequestAbort%2A> Svar på en pause forespørsel, kjøretiden kan bytte til Paused og kall <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyPaused%2A>mens scheduler fortsatt har ventende arbeidselementer.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.OnNotifyPaused%2A> Den <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.State%2A>verdien for den <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A>kan brukes til å finne ut om scheduler har ingen flere arbeid eller ble avbrutt av en forespørsel om å stanse midlertidig.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.State%2A> Den <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.RequestPause%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl>forekomsten ble returnert av den <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A>er den eneste metoden som kan kalles når WorkflowInstance er i tilstanden kjører.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.RequestPause%2A> Alle andre metoder vil Iverksett en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>Hvis kalles. Gitt regler for hvordan WorkflowInstance fører deg videre fra én tilstand til en annen, felles innstillinger for kjøring og Paused kan defineres som følger: - kjører – tilstanden mellom et kall til <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Run%2A>og neste WorkflowInstance.OnNotify*.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Run%2A> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: - Paused – The state between the last WorkflowInstance.OnNotify* and the next call to <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Run%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -Midlertidig – tilstanden mellom siste WorkflowInstance.OnNotify* og neste kall til <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Run%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Run%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"></xref> class with the specified workflow definition.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"> </xref> klassen med den angitte arbeidsflytdefinisjonen.

trans-unit.source: The activity that defines the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Aktivitet som definerer arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"></xref> class with the specified workflow definition and definition identity.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"> </xref> klassen med den angitte arbeidsflytdefinisjonen og identitet.

trans-unit.source: The activity that defines the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Aktivitet som definerer arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: The definition identity.
trans-unit.target: Definisjonen-identitet.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to begin sending pending tracking records to tracking participants asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av kjøretiden arbeidsflyten starter sender ventende sporing poster oppfølging deltakere asynkront.

trans-unit.source: The time period after which to abort the attempt.
trans-unit.target: Hvor lang tid å avbryte forsøket før.

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the track operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden som skal kalles når spor-operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The information about the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Informasjon om den asynkrone operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The status of the current track operation.
trans-unit.target: Statusen for den gjeldende spor-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> instance for this <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl>forekomsten for dette <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"> </xref>.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl>

trans-unit.source: The controller instance for this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller forekomsten for denne arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the definition identity of <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir definisjonen identiteten til <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The definition identity of <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Definisjonen identiteten til <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calls <xref:System.Disposable.Dispose*> on all extensions that implement <xref:System.IDisposable>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller <xref:System.Disposable.Dispose*>på alle utvidelser implementerer <xref:System.IDisposable>.</xref:System.IDisposable> </xref:System.Disposable.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to end the track operation.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av kjøretiden arbeidsflyten avsluttes spor-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The status of the asynchronous track operation.
trans-unit.target: Statusen for den asynkrone spor-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to send pending tracking records to tracking participants.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av kjøretiden arbeidsflyten sende ventende sporing poster oppfølging deltakere.

trans-unit.source: The time period after which to abort the attempt.
trans-unit.target: Hvor lang tid å avbryte forsøket før.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the list of activity that is blocking the update of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Henter listen over aktivitet som blokkerer oppdateringen av arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: The deserialized runtime state.
trans-unit.target: Deserialisert kjøretidsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The update map.
trans-unit.target: Update-tilordning.

trans-unit.source: The list of activity that is blocking the update.
trans-unit.target: Listen over aktivitet som blokkerer oppdateringen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the root environment for the workflow instance’s arguments and variables.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir root-miljøet for arbeidsflytforekomsten argumenter og variabler.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set after the workflow instance is initialized and <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly%2A> returns `true`, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen er angitt etter arbeidsflytforekomsten er initialisert og <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly%2A>returnerer `true`, en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>forårsakes.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: The root environment for the workflow instance’s arguments and variables.
trans-unit.target: Root-miljøet for arbeidsflytforekomsten argumenter og variabler.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique identifier for the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter den unike identifikatoren for arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Den unike identifikatoren for arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Called by the host to initialize the workflow instance with the workflow run-time state.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av verten ikke arbeidsflytforekomsten med tilstanden arbeidsflyten kjøretid.

trans-unit.source: The run-time state used to execute the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden kjøretid brukes til å utføre arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: Called by the host to initialize the workflow instance with the argument values and execution properties.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av verten ikke arbeidsflytforekomsten med argumentet verdiene og kjøring av egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: The input parameters to the workflow, keyed by argument name.
trans-unit.target: Inndataparametere for arbeidsflyten rettet av argumentet.

trans-unit.source: The list of workflow execution properties.
trans-unit.target: Listen over egenskaper for kjøring av arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: Called by the host to initialize the workflow instance with the workflow run-time state and update map.
trans-unit.target: Kalles ved å initialisere arbeidsflytforekomsten med tilstanden arbeidsflyten kjøretid og oppdatere kartet.

trans-unit.source: The run-time state used to execute the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden kjøretid brukes til å utføre arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: The update map.
trans-unit.target: Update-tilordning.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the workflow instance has been initialized.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om arbeidsflytforekomsten er initialisert.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow instance has been initialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis arbeidsflytforekomsten er initialisert; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host that new instance keys should be associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av kjøretiden arbeidsflyten skal varsles verten nye forekomst-nøkler må være knyttet til denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The instance keys to associate with this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Forekomsten for å knytte til denne arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Metoden som skal kalles når operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: An optional application-specific object that contains information about the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Et valgfritt programspesifikk-objekt som inneholder informasjon om den asynkrone operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the asynchronous associate keys operation.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til den asynkrone knytte nøkler-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous call to ask host to flush pending tracking records to tracking participants.
trans-unit.target: Asynkront kall til ber verten å tømme ventende sporing poster oppfølging deltakere.

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the track operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden som skal kalles når spor-operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The information about the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Informasjon om den asynkrone operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The status of the current track operation.
trans-unit.target: Statusen for den gjeldende spor-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous call to ask the host to persist the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Asynkront kall til å be om å beholde arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the persist operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden som skal kalles når persist-operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: An optional application-specific object that contains information about the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Et valgfritt programspesifikk-objekt som inneholder informasjon om den asynkrone operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the current persist operation.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til gjeldende beholde operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host that a resume bookmark operation is beginning.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av kjøretiden arbeidsflyten skal varsles verten som begynner å bokmerke gjenopptas.

trans-unit.source: The bookmark to resume.
trans-unit.target: Bokmerket å fortsette.

trans-unit.source: The data to be passed to the activity that created the <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Dataene som skal sendes til aktivitet som opprettet av <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The interval in which the resume operation must complete before the operation is canceled and a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Intervallet som Fortsett operasjonen må fullføres før operasjonen er avbrutt og en <xref:System.TimeoutException>forårsakes.</xref:System.TimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the resume operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden som skal kalles når Fortsett-operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: An optional application-specific object that contains information about the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Et valgfritt programspesifikk-objekt som inneholder informasjon om den asynkrone operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the asynchronous resume operation.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til den asynkrone gjenopptas.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host that a certain set of instance keys should no longer be associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av kjøretiden arbeidsflyten skal varsles verten at et bestemt sett med forekomsten nøkler lenger må være knyttet til denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The list of keys to disassociate.
trans-unit.target: Listen over for å fjerne tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host that an associate keys operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av kjøretiden arbeidsflyten skal varsles verten at en knyttet nøkler-operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The reference to the asynchronous associate keys operation.
trans-unit.target: Referansen til den asynkrone knytte nøkler-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host when the flush tracking records operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av kjøretiden arbeidsflyten skal varsles verten når tømming sporing poster operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The status of the asynchronous flush tracking records operation.
trans-unit.target: Statusen for asynkron tømming sporing poster operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host that a persist operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av kjøretiden arbeidsflyten skal varsles verten som en persist-operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The reference to the asynchronous persist operation.
trans-unit.target: Referansen til den asynkrone beholde operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host that a resume bookmark operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av kjøretiden arbeidsflyten skal varsles verten som bokmerke gjenopptas er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The reference to the asynchronous resume bookmark operation.
trans-unit.target: Referansen til den asynkrone gjenopptas bokmerke.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates the result of a <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> resume operation.
trans-unit.target: En av opplistingsverdiene som som angir resultatet av en <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"> </xref> fortsette operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host that the workflow instance has transitioned from the running state to the paused state.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av kjøretiden arbeidsflyten skal varsles verten arbeidsflytforekomsten er endret fra tilstanden kjører til stoppet midlertidig.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host an unhandled exception has occurred in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av kjøretiden arbeidsflyten skal varsles verten det oppstod et ubehandlet unntak i arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Ubehandlet unntak.

trans-unit.source: The activity that threw the exception.
trans-unit.target: Aktivitet som forårsaket unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityInstance"></xref> representing the activity that threw the exception.
trans-unit.target: Den unike identifikatoren for den <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityInstance"> </xref> som representerer aktiviteten som forårsaket unntaket.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host that an abort operation has been requested for the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av kjøretiden arbeidsflyten skal varsles verten at en abort-operasjon har blitt forespurt for arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Once OnRequestAbort is called, most <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> APIs except <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Når OnRequestAbort kalles, de fleste <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl>APIer unntatt <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A>vil throw <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl>

trans-unit.source: It is expected that after OnRequestAbort is called a host will trend toward a state in which it can satisfy the abort.
trans-unit.target: Det forventes at når OnRequestAbort kalles vert vil trend på med en tilstand som kan de oppfyller avbruddet.

trans-unit.source: The reason for aborting the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Årsak til Avbryter arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Called by the host to register the specified extension manager, validate that all required extensions are present, and to initialize the collection of extensions to be used.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av verten å registrere den angitte filtypen manager, kan du bekrefte at alle nødvendige utvidelser finnes, og initialisere samlingen over filtyper som skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: Extensions are keyed by type, and a host provided extension will always be used if provided.
trans-unit.target: Utvidelser rettet etter type, og vert angitt utvidelsen alltid brukes hvis angitt.

trans-unit.source: Extensions added through <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> use the runtime type of the object as the type key.
trans-unit.target: Utvidelser som er lagt til med <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A>brukes under kjøring av objektet som typen nøkkelen.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Extensions providers added through <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> use the decared type T of the Func\<T> as the type key.
trans-unit.target: Utvidelser leverandører lagt til med <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A>Bruk decared type T i funksjonen\<T > som typen-nøkkel.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Extension providers contributed by activities through the various *ActivityMetadata.AddDefaultExtensionProvider methods are dropped if a host extension exists for the declared type or if there is a broader type provided through AddDefaultExtensionProvider (ex.
trans-unit.target: Utvidelsen leverandører bidro av gjennom flere *ActivityMetadata.AddDefaultExtensionProvider metoder slippes Hvis det finnes en filtype som vert for den deklarerte typen, eller hvis det er en bredere leveres gjennom AddDefaultExtensionProvider (f.eks.

trans-unit.source: if Func\<StreamWriter> is provided and Func\<TextWriter> is provided, only Func\<StreamWriter> will be kept).
trans-unit.target: Hvis funksjonen\<StreamWriter > er angitt, og funksjonen\<TextWriter > er angitt, bare Func\<StreamWriter > beholdes).

trans-unit.source: If an extension does not exist in the collection that is required by an activity (expressed by calling \*ActivityMetadata.RequireExtension) a <xref:System.Activities.ValidationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis filtypen ikke finnes i samlingen som kreves av en aktivitet (uttrykt ved å kalle \*ActivityMetadata.RequireExtension) en <xref:System.Activities.ValidationException>forårsakes.</xref:System.Activities.ValidationException>

trans-unit.source: The extension manager to register.
trans-unit.target: Utvidelsen manager til å registrere.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the host supports the association of <xref:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceKeys*> with a run-time instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om verten støtter tilknytningen for <xref:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceKeys*>med en forekomst av kjøretid.</xref:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceKeys*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the host supports the association of <xref:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceKeys*> with a workflow instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis verten støtter tilknytningen for <xref:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceKeys*>med en arbeidsflytforekomst; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceView.InstanceKeys*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext> used for scheduling the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>brukes for å planlegge arbeidsflytforekomsten.</xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: If this property is set after the workflow instance is initialized and <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly%2A> returns `true`, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen er angitt etter arbeidsflytforekomsten er initialisert og <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly%2A>returnerer `true`, en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>forårsakes.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: The synchronization context used for scheduling the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Synkroniseringskontekst som brukes for å planlegge arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> if the workflow instance has been initialized, as determined by <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly*>.
trans-unit.target: Oppstår en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>Hvis arbeidsflytforekomsten har blitt initialisert, i henhold til <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly*>.</xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly*> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly%2A> returns `true`, then an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly%2A>returnerer `true`, og deretter en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>forårsakes.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the workflow definition of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter Arbeidsflytdefinisjonen for arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The workflow definition of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflytdefinisjonen til arbeidsflytforekomsten.
